metadata.title: Associate Tutorials
metadata.description: Study for the Consul Associate exam by following these tutorials. Login to Learn and bookmark them to track your progress. Study the complete list of study materials (including docs) in the Certification Prep guides.

collection.name: Associate Tutorial List
collection.description: Study for the Consul Associate exam by following these tutorials. Login to Learn and bookmark them to track your progress. Study the complete list of study materials (including docs) in the Certification Prep guides.

tutorials.name: Consul reference architecture
tutorials.description:
Learn recommended practices and a reference
architecture for HashiCorp Consul single cluster production deployments.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Federate multiple datacenters with WAN gossip
tutorials.description: Federate Consul datacenters using a single WAN gossip pool.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Deployment Guide
tutorials.description: Deploy your first three-server Consul datacenter in accordance with the Reference Architecture on Linux or Windows.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Automate upgrades with Consul Enterprise
tutorials.description: Upgrade your Consul datacenters without downtime using automated upgrades. This functionally is provided through the Enterprise feature of autopilot.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Add and remove Consul servers
tutorials.description: There are several methods for adding or removing servers from the Consul datacenter. Learn the best practices for each method.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Provide fault tolerance with redundancy zones
tutorials.description: Use Consulâ€™s redundancy zones to provide high availability in the case of server failure through the Enterprise feature of autopilot.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Run the Consul agent
tutorials.description: Run a Consul agent in development mode, and learn about the server and client modes that you would use when running Consul in production.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Understand Consul service mesh
tutorials.description: Consul can be deployed as a service mesh that provides service-to-service connection authorization and encryption using mutual TLS. Learn how to configure Consul as your Kubernetes service mesh to encrypt and control traffic between services.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Store data with Consul KV store
tutorials.description: Add and manage data in the Consul key value store, using the Consul command-line interface.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Troubleshoot common Consul issues
tutorials.description: Find and fix problems with your Consul datacenter using built-in and external tools.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Forward DNS for Consul service discovery
tutorials.description: Enable service discovery by configuring DNS forwarding for Consul.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Ensure only healthy services are discoverable
tutorials.description: Use Consul's health checks capability to monitor datacenter health, and learn how it is used by the service discovery components to route traffic away from unhealthy hosts.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Explore the Consul UI
tutorials.description: Consul comes with support for a user-friendly and functional web UI out of the box. In this tutorial, you will explore the web UI.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Service configuration with Consul Template
tutorials.description: Programmatically render configuration files from a variety of locations including Consul KV with Consul Template

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Automate geo-failover with prepared queries
tutorials.description: Use Consul's prepared query capability, to automate geo failover policies for services in the case that one of multiple connected datacenters is unavailable.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Monitor Consul Datacenter Health
tutorials.description: Discover Consul health and server health metrics to make sure your datacenter is healthy and establish a baseline for monitoring.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Create a distributed semaphore with Consul KV store and sessions
tutorials.description: Implement a distributed semaphore using the Consul KV store.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Create a local Consul datacenter
tutorials.description: Join two Consul agents together to form a multi-agent Consul datacenter. You will use Vagrant to create the environment for this tutorial.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

product.name: Vagrant
product.description: Learn to create development environments with Vagrant

tutorials.name: Backup Consul data and state
tutorials.description: Use the snapshot tool for backing up and restoring Consul data.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Secure applications with service sidecar proxies
tutorials.description: Deploy applications on Kubernetes using Consul service mesh to encrypt and control traffic between services with mTLS.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Secure service communication with Consul service mesh and Envoy
tutorials.description: Gain hands-on experience with Consul service mesh and Envoy as a sidecar proxy.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Enforce a zero-trust network with Consul service mesh
tutorials.description: Define intentions to introduce a zero-trust network security approach in your Kubernetes cluster.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Secure Consul agent communication with TLS encryption
tutorials.description: Secure RPC and consensus communication by creating and deploying certificates to Consul agents.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Update Consul agents to securely communicate with TLS
tutorials.description: Secure RPC and consensus communication by creating and deploying certificates to Consul agents on an existing datacenter.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Production readiness checklist
tutorials.description: Production readiness checklist.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Secure Consul with access control lists (ACLs)
tutorials.description: Secure your production Consul datacenter with ACLs.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Bootstrap and explore Consul's access control system
tutorials.description: Control access to data and APIs using Consul's Access Control List (ACL) system.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Understand access control privileges
tutorials.description: Discover the minimum privileges required to complete operations within your Consul datacenter and how to manage access using the operator-only implementation method.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Rotate gossip encryption keys in Consul
tutorials.description: Rotate gossip encryption keys in your Consul datacenter to keep datacenter secure.

product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

metadata.title: Consul by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Consul is a service networking solution to automate network configurations, discover services, and enable secure connectivity across any cloud or runtime.

alertBanner.text: Our community conference is taking place in San Francisco and online October 10-12.
